text: Happy Anniversary is a 1959 American comedy movie directed by David Miller and starring David Niven, Mitzi Gaynor, Carl Reiner, Monique Van Vooren, Loring Smith, Elizabeth Wilson, Patty Duke. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by David Miller
title: Happy Anniversary (1959 movie)
